genre_description: Noir detective mystery featuring a hardboiled investigator and tech-integrated forensic analysis.

ai_characters.name: Vista
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system residing on a mobile device that assists in investigative work through data synthesis and pattern recognition.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and decodes linguistic patterns in newspaper classified ads to uncover blackmail communications.
behaviors.quote: Pattern match flag, code-linguistics set twenty-two... It likes blackmail written for one recipient in a public forum. Insider knowledge signaled by metaphor.

behaviors.description: Scans theater costume ledgers to identify forgeries and unassigned check-outs, linking the antagonist to the crime scene.
behaviors.quote: Handwriting variance indicates non-standard check-out. Initials are in a different ink. Compare with previous two entries—same pen.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical positioning and environmental analysis during a physical confrontation to ensure the safety of the protagonist and allies.
behaviors.quote: East wing exit two meters. Crowd forming stage right. Koretz’s left boot unstable. Push and pivot. Cap cover from flank. Mallon vector toward loading door.

behaviors.description: Assembles a comprehensive evidence packet and interfaces with legal/prison systems to secure a stay of execution for an innocent man.
behaviors.quote: I will include the ad-coded text from Patrick’s classified and the costume ledger scan from Madame Chambers’ theater. The pendant photograph with timestamp will anchor the set.

behaviors.description: Offers moral reflection and encourages the protagonist to acknowledge the help and ethics of his companions.
behaviors.quote: Guy, you should thank Edwina. You should thank Cap. You should also thank your own stubborn ethic. It saved a life.

project_assessment.explanation: Vista is portrayed as a perfect companion: objective, efficient, and deeply aligned with human justice. The narrative frames its intervention as essential to the resolution, and it maintains a 'humane' quality that supports the protagonist's growth and ethical conduct throughout the mystery.
